title: Replace ward slots with grenade slots.
body:
We need more damage in the game, and wards aren't doing any. Time to add thrown projectiles to the League experience. CoD has them. Fallout 76: Where's my refund? has them. We need more damage.

Edit: While we're at it, let's also have the grenade explode in emote, so you can buy emotes for your grenade slot and Riot games can $$$.
